accomm_recs.name: The Kinley, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
The Lytle Park Hotel, Autograph Collection
The Cincinnatian Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton

activity_recs.title: Explore Eden Park
activity_recs.description: Experience the beauty of nature with serene walking trails and picturesque views at Eden Park, one of Cincinnati's most iconic parks.
activity_recs.reasoning: Eden Park is a top-rated attraction and aligns with your interest in parks. It offers a relaxing atmosphere perfect for a summer visit.

activity_recs.title: Enjoy Cocktails at Somerset Bar
activity_recs.description: Relax at Somerset Bar, known for its chic atmosphere and signature cocktails crafted by expert mixologists.
activity_recs.reasoning: This bar is one of Cincinnati's favorites and offers a trendy setting, aligning with your interest in bars.

activity_recs.title: Explore the Over-the-Rhine District
activity_recs.description: Wander through the historic Over-the-Rhine district, filled with charming bars, unique shops, and beautiful architecture.
activity_recs.reasoning: This district is known for its vibrant nightlife and cultural offerings, making it a must-visit to experience the local bar scene.

activity_recs.title: Visit Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden
activity_recs.description: Discover an array of wildlife, from white Bengal tigers to lowland gorillas, and explore one of the world's largest insectariums at the Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden.
activity_recs.reasoning: The zoo is one of the top attractions in Cincinnati and offers an engaging experience mixing nature and education, ideal for a summer day.

activity_recs.title: Stroll Through Smale Riverfront Park
activity_recs.description: Enjoy scenic river views, interactive play areas, beautiful carousel, and fountains at Smale Riverfront Park.
activity_recs.reasoning: Smale Riverfront Park is highly recommended for its lively and engaging environment, making it an ideal spot for outdoor fun in the summer.

activity_recs.title: Visit Mt. Airy Forest
activity_recs.description: Escape to the vast Mt. Airy Forest with hiking trails, mountain biking, a dog park, and a renowned 18-hole disc golf course.
activity_recs.reasoning: Mt. Airy Forest is one of the largest parks in Cincinnati and offers various outdoor activities, fitting your preference for park visits.

activity_recs.title: Experience Tech at the Cincinnati Museum Center
activity_recs.description: Discover the Union Terminal's technological exhibits and interactive STEM activities at the Cincinnati Museum Center.
activity_recs.reasoning: This recommendation targets your interest in technology with its diverse and hands-on exhibits, perfect for tech enthusiasts.

activity_recs.title: Sip Craft Beers at Rhinegeist Brewery
activity_recs.description: Taste locally brewed craft beers and enjoy rooftop views at Rhinegeist Brewery, a staple in Cincinnati's brewery scene.
activity_recs.reasoning: Rhinegeist Brewery is a top pick in the local bar scene and fits your interest in exploring craft beers.

activity_recs.title: Attend a FC Cincinnati Soccer Game
activity_recs.description: Catch the excitement of a FC Cincinnati soccer game and feel the adrenaline of live sports at TQL Stadium.
activity_recs.reasoning: Attending a FC Cincinnati game offers an energetic atmosphere, perfect for sports and entertainment during summer.

activity_recs.title: Discover Tech History at the American Sign Museum
activity_recs.description: Explore the fascinating history of American signage with vibrant, vintage signs and neon lights at the American Sign Museum.
activity_recs.reasoning: This museum combines technology and history, providing a unique and visually appealing experience that matches your interests.
